interpretation:
The "Hourglass Done" card represents the end of a cycle. Just as the last grain of sand falls through an hourglass, this card signals that a task or phase in your life is complete. It is time to reflect on the past and let go of what is no longer serving you. You have reached the end of a journey and it's time to move on to something new.

This card also reminds us of the importance of time. Time is a precious resource and it's important to use it wisely. This card may be a sign to be more mindful of how you spend your time and to prioritize what is truly important.

Additionally, the "Hourglass Done" card is a reminder that all things must come to an end. While endings can be difficult, they also bring new opportunities for growth and transformation. Embrace the changes that come with the completion of this cycle and look forward to what the future holds.

Overall, the "Hourglass Done" card represents completion, finality, and the importance of time. Use this card as a reminder to reflect on the past, let go of what no longer serves you, and embrace new beginnings.
